blogPost.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.
blogPost.body: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.
blogPost.title: Macro - Supercharge your team’s processes
blogPost.author: Ryan

localize.description: Macro帮助团队超额完成人工和重复性流程。我们强大的核对表使团队能够快速记录流程、分配任务、跟踪进度，并将常见的操作自动化。
localize.tagline: 为您的团队流程注入活力

localize.description: Macro幫助團隊超額完成人工和重複性流程。我們強大的核對錶使團隊能夠快速記錄流程、分配任務、跟蹤進度，並將常見的操作自動化。
localize.tagline: 爲您的團隊流程注入活力

previous.excerpt: Zyla is the fastest end-to-end headless commerce stack that blends cutting-edge content management and commerce tools that can accept payments and ship worldwide instantly once deployed to Vercel.
previous.title: Zyla - The fastest headless commerce stack on earth ⚡

localize.description: Zyla是最快的端到端无头商务堆栈，它融合了最先进的内容管理和商务工具，一旦部署到Vercel，就可以接受支付并立即向全球发货。
localize.tagline: 地球上最快的无头商业堆栈 ⚡ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇

localize.description: Zyla是最快的端到端無頭商務堆棧，它融合了最先進的內容管理和商務工具，一旦部署到Vercel，就可以接受支付並立即向全球發貨。
localize.tagline: 地球上最快的無頭商業堆棧 ⚡ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇ ◇

next.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
next.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best

localize.description: 找不到合适的开场白？我们使用GPT-3生成了数万条Tinder开场白，并从中挑选出最好的开场白（根据我们有限的经验）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3产生了数以千计的打开器，我们挑选了最好的打开器。

localize.description: 找不到合適的開場白？我們使用GPT-3生成了數萬條Tinder開場白，並從中挑選出最好的開場白（根據我們有限的經驗）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3產生了數以千計的打開器，我們挑選了最好的打開器。
